I really have no problem with the palestinians. They were born into poverty and I don't blame them for lashing out at Isreal for what has happened to them.

However, Isreal nor the United States are not the solution to the problem. Muslims in Palestine need to destroy the corruption and poverty in their own country. By the time they have become a first world country, they will be educated enough to not blame others for their problems.
